name: Spotlighter
description:
A simple game I made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3. I missed the jam's start by a few days, but I still made this in a couple of days.

This is a puzzle platformer where you can make the room dark, and walk on spotlight beams to reach the exit. The game includes 16 levels.

WASD or Numpad 8466 to move
Spacebar or Numpad 7 to toggle the lights
R or Numpad 0 to restart
